001package ca.gc.cra.radar.application.pipeline;
002
003import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.FrameDecoder;
004import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.MetricsPort;
005import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.PacketSource;
006import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.SegmentPersistencePort;
007import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.capture.SegmentRecord;
008import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.net.FiveTuple;
009import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.net.RawFrame;
010import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.net.TcpSegment;
011import java.util.Objects;
012import java.util.Optional;
013import org.slf4j.Logger;
014import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
015import org.slf4j.MDC;
016
017/**
018 * Coordinates packet capture by polling a {@link PacketSource}, decoding frames, and persisting
019 * TCP segments.
020 * <p>Not thread-safe; expected to run once per process. Filters pure ACKs to reduce storage
021 * volume.</p>
022 *
023 * @implNote Uses {@link SegmentPersistencePort#persist(SegmentRecord)} for each accepted segment
024 * and increments metrics counters for observability.
025 * @see ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.SegmentPersistencePort
026 * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
027 */
028public final class SegmentCaptureUseCase {
029  private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(SegmentCaptureUseCase.class);
030
031  private final PacketSource packetSource;
032  private final FrameDecoder frameDecoder;
033  private final SegmentPersistencePort persistence;
034  private final MetricsPort metrics;
035
036  /**
037   * Creates a capture use case with the supplied dependencies.
038   *
039   * @param packetSource source of raw frames
040   * @param frameDecoder decoder that maps frames to TCP segments
041   * @param persistence sink for persisted segments
042   * @param metrics metrics sink for capture counters
043   */
044  public SegmentCaptureUseCase(
045      PacketSource packetSource,
046      FrameDecoder frameDecoder,
047      SegmentPersistencePort persistence,
048      MetricsPort metrics) {
049    this.packetSource = Objects.requireNonNull(packetSource, "packetSource");
050    this.frameDecoder = Objects.requireNonNull(frameDecoder, "frameDecoder");
051    this.persistence = Objects.requireNonNull(persistence, "persistence");
052    this.metrics = Objects.requireNonNull(metrics, "metrics");
053  }
054
055  /**
056   * Runs the capture loop until interrupted, persisting each non-empty TCP segment.
057   *
058   * @throws Exception if any port fails during capture, persistence, or cleanup
059   * @implNote Interrupts the current thread when {@link InterruptedException} is observed during poll.
060   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
061   */
062  public void run() throws Exception {
063    boolean started = false;
064    long persistedCount = 0;
065    try {
066      packetSource.start();
067      started = true;
068      log.info("Capture packet source started");
069
070      while (!Thread.currentThread().isInterrupted()) {
071        RawFrame frame;
072        try {
073          Optional<RawFrame> maybeFrame = packetSource.poll();
074          if (maybeFrame.isEmpty()) {
075            if (packetSource.isExhausted()) {
076              log.info("Capture packet source exhausted; stopping capture loop");
077              break;
078            }
079            continue;
080          }
081          frame = maybeFrame.get();
082        } catch (InterruptedException ex) {
083          Thread.currentThread().interrupt();
084          log.info("Capture loop interrupted; draining and shutting down");
085          break;
086        }
087
088        Optional<TcpSegment> maybeSegment = frameDecoder.decode(frame);
089        if (maybeSegment.isEmpty()) {
090          metrics.increment("capture.segment.skipped.decode");
091          continue;
092        }
093
094        TcpSegment segment = maybeSegment.get();
095        if (isPureAck(segment)) {
096          metrics.increment("capture.segment.skipped.pureAck");
097          continue;
098        }
099
100        SegmentRecord record = toRecord(frame.timestampMicros(), segment);
101        String previousFlowId = MDC.get("flowId");
102        try {
103          MDC.put("flowId", formatFlow(segment.flow()));
104          persistence.persist(record);
105          persistedCount++;
106        } finally {
107          if (previousFlowId == null) {
108            MDC.remove("flowId");
109          } else {
110            MDC.put("flowId", previousFlowId);
111          }
112        }
113        metrics.increment("capture.segment.persisted");
114      }
115    } finally {
116      try {
117        persistence.flush();
118        log.info("Capture persistence flushed after {} segments", persistedCount);
119      } catch (Exception ex) {
120        log.error("Failed to flush capture persistence", ex);
121        throw ex;
122      } finally {
123        try {
124          persistence.close();
125          log.info("Capture persistence port closed");
126        } catch (Exception ex) {
127          log.error("Failed to close capture persistence port", ex);
128          throw ex;
129        } finally {
130          if (started) {
131            try {
132              packetSource.close();
133              log.info("Capture packet source closed");
134            } catch (Exception ex) {
135              log.error("Failed to close packet source", ex);
136              throw ex;
137            }
138          }
139        }
140      }
141    }
142  }
143
144  /**
145   * Determines whether a segment represents a pure ACK frame.
146   *
147   * @param segment segment under inspection
148   * @return {@code true} if the segment contains only the ACK flag
149   */
150  private static boolean isPureAck(TcpSegment segment) {
151    return segment.payload().length == 0
152        && segment.ack()
153        && !segment.syn()
154        && !segment.fin()
155        && !segment.rst()
156        && !segment.psh();
157  }
158
159  /**
160   * Converts a decoded TCP segment into a persisted record.
161   *
162   * @param timestampMicros capture timestamp in microseconds
163   * @param segment decoded TCP segment
164   * @return record ready for persistence
165   */
166  private static SegmentRecord toRecord(long timestampMicros, TcpSegment segment) {
167    FiveTuple flow = segment.flow();
168    int flags = 0;
169    if (segment.fin()) flags |= SegmentRecord.FIN;
170    if (segment.syn()) flags |= SegmentRecord.SYN;
171    if (segment.rst()) flags |= SegmentRecord.RST;
172    if (segment.psh()) flags |= SegmentRecord.PSH;
173    if (segment.ack()) flags |= SegmentRecord.ACK;
174
175    return new SegmentRecord(
176        timestampMicros,
177        flow.srcIp(),
178        flow.srcPort(),
179        flow.dstIp(),
180        flow.dstPort(),
181        segment.sequenceNumber(),
182        flags,
183        segment.payload());
184  }
185
186  private static String formatFlow(FiveTuple flow) {
187    return flow.srcIp() + ":" + flow.srcPort() + "->" + flow.dstIp() + ":" + flow.dstPort();
188  }
189}
